Ansible Self-Hosted Install¶

Ubuntu - Debian:

apt install git

CentOS:

yum install git

  • Remember to check and correct (if necessary) the server’s date and time
  • Remember to check and correct (if necessary) the server’s hostname and ip address
  • Cloning the official OML repository and select release to be deployed
git clone https://gitlab.com/omnileads/ominicontacto.git
cd ominicontacto
git checkout master
cd deploy/ansible

  • Check your hostname and ip address
hostname
ip a

hostname output

ip a output

  • Edit your inventory file accord to the “hostname” and “ip a” commands output
